sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>forehead</radical> is the <radical>origin</radical> for the <radical>measurement</radical> for your <kanji>crown</kanji>! If you measure somewhere else on your head for a crown it won't fit.
meaningInfo: Imagine someone putting a tape measure around your forehead and taking careful measurements for your crown. They better not mess up, or you'll have them put to death!
readingMnemonic: You want your <kanji>crown</kanji> to be just like Genghis <reading>Khan</reading>'s (<ja>かん</ja>), which was more of a cap. He's your hero though, because he ruled over the most people, so you want yours to match his measurements.
readingInfo: Why don't you go look up what Genghis Khan's crown/cap looked like. Then try to imagine how it would look atop your head.
